title: Cannot access "Tips & Support" section in the settings
content: When I tap on "Tips & support" in Settings, it goes nothing and jumps back to Home Screen. I tried to clear all cache and user data in Google and Google Plat Services but it doesn't help. Also, I tried to option "Tips and support" after switched to Safe Mode and the result is the same (jump back to Home Screen). Is there anything I can do or try without hard reset my phone (it's annoying..............) Thanks
